I’m just worried about finding a job that I’ll actually enjoy. I think I’d like something that allows me to be creative and work with people. Maybe marketing or something in event planning.

It felt good to finally take that step. I applied to three places. A bit nervous, but also relieved to have done it. Not yet, but I’m trying to be patient. Yes, actually. I had a disagreement with a friend, but I tried to write it down like we discussed.
I realized that I need to communicate more openly instead of shutting down.

I managed to cook that pasta recipe I mentioned! It turned out really well. It was fun! I felt accomplished. I went for two runs! It felt good to get back into it. They helped clear my mind a lot. I felt energized afterward.

It helped! I was able to express my feelings better when we talked. I want to keep improving. It feels good to express myself. Excellent! It sounds like you’re making strides in many areas of your life. I’m proud of the progress you’re making.

Yes, I’d like that. Maybe I could reach out to people in those fields for advice. That sounds like a good idea! I’ll try to do that. You’re welcome! Remember, it’s all about taking small steps. Let’s check in on your goals next time and see how everything is progressing.
